alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 5:42PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Bradley, Drew and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 615 PM CST... At 542 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Ingalls, or 11 miles north of West Crossett, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Wilmar... Green Hill... Brandon... Plantersville... Ladelle... New Hope in Drew County... Enon... Johnsonville... Blanchton... Selma... Vick... Valley... Montongo... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Rock Springs... Coleman... Sumpter... Lacey... Relfs Bluff... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
